languages.text: "И знаете что? Мне понравилось. Да, вот так — лицом о скалы и по горло в воде, зато я, наконец, смогла ощутить привкус свободы. Совсем чуть-чуть, самую малость... Но и этого хватило, чтобы мечтать теперь о ней по ночам. {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Касбаллика{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:ColdTrade}хладный торг{/g}? В пасть к пустотному кракену! Ну а наши с вами совместные дела, шерин... Если вы пожелаете — я останусь вашим верным партнером. Равным партнером". {n}Последние слова Джай выделяет особенно жарко.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "И знаете что? Мне понравилось. Да, вот так — лицом о скалы и по горло в воде, зато я, наконец, смогла ощутить привкус свободы. Совсем чуть-чуть, самую малость... Но и этого хватило, чтобы мечтать теперь о ней по ночам. {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Касбаллика{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:ColdTrade}хладный торг{/g}? В пасть к пустотному кракену! Ну а наши с вами совместные дела, шерин... Если вы пожелаете — я останусь вашим верным партнером. Равным партнером". {n}Последние слова Джай выделяет особенно жарко.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "And you know what? I enjoyed it. Yes, I was slammed face-first into the rocks and was up to my neck in water, but I finally had a taste of freedom. Just a smidge, just a little bit... But it was enough to make me dream of it every night. Void kraken take the {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g} and the {g|Encyclopedia:ColdTrade}Cold Trade{/g}! As for... our mutual business, shereen... I will remain your loyal partner if you desire. An equal partner." {n}She utters the last few words with particular vehemence.{/n}
languages.original_text: "И знаете что? Мне понравилось. Да, вот так — лицом о скалы и по горло в воде, зато я, наконец, смогла ощутить привкус свободы. Совсем чуть-чуть, самую малость... Но и этого хватило, чтобы мечтать теперь о ней по ночам. {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Касбаллика{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:ColdTrade}хладный торг{/g}? В пасть к пустотному кракену! Ну а наши с вами совместные дела, шерин... Если вы пожелаете — я останусь вашим верным партнером. Равным партнером". {n}Последние слова Джай выделяет особенно жарко.{/n}

Void kraken take the {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g} and the {g|Encyclopedia:ColdTrade}cold trade{/g}! As for the... our mutual business, shereen... I will remain your loyal partner if you desire. An equal partner." {n}She exhales the last few words especially hotly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "And you know what? I enjoyed it. Yes, I was slammed face-first into the rocks and was up to my neck in water, but I finally had a taste of freedom. Just a smidge, just a little bit... But it was enough to make me dream of it every night. Void kraken take the {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g} and the {g|Encyclopedia:ColdTrade}Cold Trade{/g}! As for... our mutual business, shereen... I will remain your loyal partner if you desire. An equal partner." {n}She utters the last few words with particular vehemence.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: “你知道吗？我很享受这个过程。没错，虽然我脸朝下摔在了岩石上，还被海水没过了脖子，但我终于尝到了自由的滋味。虽然只有一点点，一丁点……但已经足以让我每晚都梦到它了。愿虚空的海怪带走{g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}卡斯巴利卡{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:ColdTrade}冷市贸易{/g}！至于……我们共同的生意，亲爱的……如果你愿意的话，我今后依然会是你忠诚的伙伴，是你平等的伙伴。”{n}她尤为热切地吐出了最后几个字。{/n}
languages.original_text: "And you know what? I enjoyed it. Yes, I was slammed face-first into the rocks and was up to my neck in water, but I finally had a taste of freedom. Just a smidge, just a little bit... But it was enough to make me dream of it every night. Void kraken take the {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g} and the {g|Encyclopedia:ColdTrade}Cold Trade{/g}! As for... our mutual business, shereen... I will remain your loyal partner if you desire. An equal partner." {n}She utters the last few words with particular vehemence.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “你知道吗？我很享受这个过程。没错，虽然我脸朝下摔在了岩石上，还被海水没过了脖子，但我终于尝到了自由的滋味。虽然只有一点点，一丁点……但已经足以让我每晚都梦到它了。愿虚空的海怪带走{g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}卡斯巴利卡{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:ColdTrade}冷市贸易{/g}！至于……我们共同的生意，亲爱的……如果你愿意的话，我今后依然会是你忠诚的伙伴，是你平等的伙伴。”{n}她尤为热切地吐出了最后几个字。{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.original_text: "And you know what? I enjoyed it. Yes, I was slammed face-first into the rocks and was up to my neck in water, but I finally had a taste of freedom. Just a smidge, just a little bit... But it was enough to make me dream of it every night. Void kraken take the Kasballica and the Cold Trade! As for... our mutual business, shereen... I will remain your loyal partner if you desire. An equal partner." {n}She utters the last few words with particular vehemence.{/n}

languages.text: «¿Y sabe qué? Me gustaba. Sí, me estrellé de cara contra las rocas y estaba con el agua al cuello, pero por fin pude experimentar un poco de libertad. Nada más que un bocadito, solo eso... pero bastó para hacer que cada noche soñara con ello. ¡Que un kraken del vacío se lleve a la {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g} y al {g|Encyclopedia:ColdTrade}Comercio Frío{/g}! En cuanto a nuestro... acuerdo mutuo, shereen... seguiré siendo su leal compañera si lo desea. En igualdad de condiciones». {n}Pronuncia las últimas palabras con especial vehemencia.{/n}
languages.original_text: "And you know what? I enjoyed it. Yes, I was slammed face-first into the rocks and was up to my neck in water, but I finally had a taste of freedom. Just a smidge, just a little bit... But it was enough to make me dream of it every night. Void kraken take the {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g} and the {g|Encyclopedia:ColdTrade}Cold Trade{/g}! As for... our mutual business, shereen... I will remain your loyal partner if you desire. An equal partner." {n}She utters the last few words with particular vehemence.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «¿Y sabe qué? Me gustaba. Sí, me estrellé de cara contra las rocas y estaba con el agua al cuello, pero por fin pude experimentar un poco de libertad. Nada más que un bocadito, solo eso... pero bastó para hacer que cada noche soñara con ello. ¡Que un kraken del vacío se lleve a la {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g} y al {g|Encyclopedia:ColdTrade}Comercio Frío{/g}! En cuanto a nuestro... acuerdo mutuo, shereen... seguiré siendo su leal compañera si lo desea. En igualdad de condiciones». {n}Pronuncia las últimas palabras con especial vehemencia.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: 「あたしはそれを楽しんだわ。そう、岩に顔から叩きつけられ、首まで水に浸かったけど、やっと自由を味わえたの。ほんの少し、ほんの少しだけだったけれどね…でも、毎晩その夢を見るようになるには十分だったわ。ヴォイド・クラーケンが{g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}カスバリカ{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:ColdTrade}闇取引{/g}を奪う！あたしたちのビジネスについては…シャリーン…あんたが望むなら、あたしは忠実なパートナーであり続けるわ。対等なパートナーとしてね」{n}彼女は最後の数語を、特に強く告げた。{/n}
languages.original_text: "And you know what? I enjoyed it. Yes, I was slammed face-first into the rocks and was up to my neck in water, but I finally had a taste of freedom. Just a smidge, just a little bit... But it was enough to make me dream of it every night. Void kraken take the {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g} and the {g|Encyclopedia:ColdTrade}Cold Trade{/g}! As for... our mutual business, shereen... I will remain your loyal partner if you desire. An equal partner." {n}She utters the last few words with particular vehemence.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「あたしはそれを楽しんだわ。そう、岩に顔から叩きつけられ、首まで水に浸かったけど、やっと自由を味わえたの。ほんの少し、ほんの少しだけだったけれどね…でも、毎晩その夢を見るようになるには十分だったわ。ヴォイド・クラーケンが{g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}カスバリカ{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:ColdTrade}闇取引{/g}を奪う！あたしたちのビジネスについては…シャリーン…あんたが望むなら、あたしは忠実なパートナーであり続けるわ。対等なパートナーとしてね」{n}彼女は最後の数語を、特に強く告げた。{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Und wisst Ihr was? Es hat mir Spaß gemacht. Ja, ich wurde mit dem Kopf gegen die Felsen geschleudert und stand bis zum Hals im Wasser, aber ich hatte endlich von der Freiheit gekostet. Nur ein klein wenig, ein klitzekleines bisschen ... Aber es hat gereicht, um mich jede Nacht davon träumen zu lassen. Möge ein Leerenkrake die {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g} und den {g|Encyclopedia:ColdTrade}Kalthandel{/g} holen! Was unsere ... gemeinsamen Geschäfte angeht, Shereen ... Wenn Ihr es wünscht, so bleibe ich Eure treue Partnerin. Eine ebenbürtige Partnerin." {n}Die letzten Worte spricht sie mit besonderer Vehemenz.{/n}
languages.original_text: "And you know what? I enjoyed it. Yes, I was slammed face-first into the rocks and was up to my neck in water, but I finally had a taste of freedom. Just a smidge, just a little bit... But it was enough to make me dream of it every night. Void kraken take the {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g} and the {g|Encyclopedia:ColdTrade}Cold Trade{/g}! As for... our mutual business, shereen... I will remain your loyal partner if you desire. An equal partner." {n}She utters the last few words with particular vehemence.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Und wisst Ihr was? Es hat mir Spaß gemacht. Ja, ich wurde mit dem Kopf gegen die Felsen geschleudert und stand bis zum Hals im Wasser, aber ich hatte endlich von der Freiheit gekostet. Nur ein klein wenig, ein klitzekleines bisschen ... Aber es hat gereicht, um mich jede Nacht davon träumen zu lassen. Möge ein Leerenkrake die {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g} und den {g|Encyclopedia:ColdTrade}Kalthandel{/g} holen! Was unsere ... gemeinsamen Geschäfte angeht, Shereen ... Wenn Ihr es wünscht, so bleibe ich Eure treue Partnerin. Eine ebenbürtige Partnerin." {n}Die letzten Worte spricht sie mit besonderer Vehemenz.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: « Et vous savez quoi ? Ça ne m'a pas déplu. Oui, je me suis fracassée tête la première contre les rochers et j'ai bien failli sombrer, mais j'ai enfin goûté à la liberté. Je n'en ai eu qu'un bref aperçu... mais cela a suffi à m'en faire rêver toutes les nuits. Que le kraken du vide emporte la {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g} et le {g|Encyclopedia:ColdTrade}Commerce Froid{/g} ! Quant à... nos affaires mutuelles, shereen... Je resterai votre loyale partenaire si vous le désirez. Une partenaire sur un pied d'égalité, » {n}déclare-t-elle en insistant impétueusement sur ces derniers mots.{/n}
languages.original_text: "And you know what? I enjoyed it. Yes, I was slammed face-first into the rocks and was up to my neck in water, but I finally had a taste of freedom. Just a smidge, just a little bit... But it was enough to make me dream of it every night. Void kraken take the {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g} and the {g|Encyclopedia:ColdTrade}Cold Trade{/g}! As for... our mutual business, shereen... I will remain your loyal partner if you desire. An equal partner." {n}She utters the last few words with particular vehemence.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Et vous savez quoi ? Ça ne m'a pas déplu. Oui, je me suis fracassée tête la première contre les rochers et j'ai bien failli sombrer, mais j'ai enfin goûté à la liberté. Je n'en ai eu qu'un bref aperçu... mais cela a suffi à m'en faire rêver toutes les nuits. Que le kraken du vide emporte la {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g} et le {g|Encyclopedia:ColdTrade}Commerce Froid{/g} ! Quant à... nos affaires mutuelles, shereen... Je resterai votre loyale partenaire si vous le désirez. Une partenaire sur un pied d'égalité, » {n}déclare-t-elle en insistant impétueusement sur ces derniers mots.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Biliyor musun? Çok keyifliydi. Evet, suratım kayalara yapıştı... Boğazıma kadar suya battım ama sonunda özgürlüğü tadabildim. Bir nebze belki, ucundan ama her gece hayalini kurmama yetti de arttı bile. {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica'yı{/g} da {g|Encyclopedia:ColdTrade}Soğuk Ticaret'i{/g} de uçsuz krakeni yesin! Birlikte yürüttüğümüz işlere gelirsek şirinim, arzularsan senin sadık ortağın olarak kalırım. Dengin olurum." {n}Son cümlesini özellikle hararetli bir şekilde söylüyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "And you know what? I enjoyed it. Yes, I was slammed face-first into the rocks and was up to my neck in water, but I finally had a taste of freedom. Just a smidge, just a little bit... But it was enough to make me dream of it every night. Void kraken take the {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g} and the {g|Encyclopedia:ColdTrade}Cold Trade{/g}! As for... our mutual business, shereen... I will remain your loyal partner if you desire. An equal partner." {n}She utters the last few words with particular vehemence.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Biliyor musun? Çok keyifliydi. Evet fırlatıldım ve suratım kayalara yapıştı, evet boğazıma kadar suya battım ama sonunda özgürlüğün nasıl bir şey olduğunu hissedebiliyorum. Bir nebze belki, belki küçük bir parça ama her gece hayalini kurmama yetti de attı bile. {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g}'yı da {g|Encyclopedia:ColdTrade}Soğuk Ticaret{/g}'i de uçsuz krakeni yesin! Ortak çalışmalarımıza gelirsek şirinim, eğer arzularsan senin sadık partnerin olarak kalacağım. Denk konumda bir partner." {n}Bu son sözleri özellikle hararetli bir şekilde söylüyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
